summary: These legendary gloves once belonged to a master thief. Now they are to be claimed as you're own!
descriptionHtml:
These legendary gloves once belonged to a master thief, now long since forgotten. Uncover the whereabouts of this ancient criminal's remains, and you can claim them as your own! These very special gloves grant the wearer the power to open any keyless lock without fail. Now you too can become a master thief!

Installation: Just install via NMM, or manually extract the esp to your data folder, and merge the meshes, textures, and scripts folders with the ones in your data folder.

Compatibility: There shouldn't be any issues with other mods.

Hope you enjoy! :)

(Hint: Blackreach)
author: simsim899
